selected_quotes: 'In the Court of Appeal, there is not one BAME judge...'
A rare opportunity for diversity has arisen in the Supreme Court - but are they willing to grasp it?
In less than two years half of the Supreme Court will need to be replaced - a perfect opportunity to diversify
Six vacancies on the @UKSupremeCourt this year next create a valuable opportunity to improve judicial diversity

citation.abstract: At least half of the UK's Supreme Court will retire in the next two years, presenting a prime opportunity for a more representative judiciary.
citation.title: Opportunity knocks for UK's Supreme Court to become more diverse

facebook.title: Opportunity knocks for UK's Supreme Court to become more diverse
facebook.summary: Potential retirements over the next two years will mean that over half of the Supreme Court will need to be replaced. This could be an opportunity to diversify since, of the 12 current Supreme Court justices, all are white, one is female, and only two were
